com.yubico.u2f.data.messages.key

Class RawSignResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yubico.u2f.data.messages.key.RawSignResponse

  • public class RawSignResponse
extends java.lang.Object
    The sign response produced by the token/key, which is transformed by the client into an SignResponse and sent to the server.

      • getUserPresence

        public byte getUserPresence()
        Bit 0 is set to 1, which means that user presence was verified. (This version of the protocol doesn't specify a way to request sign responses without requiring user presence.) A different value of bit 0, as well as bits 1 through 7, are reserved for future use. The values of bit 1 through 7 SHOULD be 0

      • getCounter

        public long getCounter()
        This is the big-endian representation of a counter value that the U2F device increments every time it performs a sign operation.

      • getSignature

        public byte[] getSignature()
        This is a ECDSA signature (on P-256)

      • checkUserPresence

        public void checkUserPresence()
                       throws U2fBadInputException
        Throws:
        U2fBadInputException
